sentence.text: However, in hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation), the characteristics and mechanism of regulation of activated T cell proliferation expression have not been well defined.

entity.text: regulation of activated T cell proliferation

sentence.text: In this study, regulation of activated T cell proliferation expression in tumor cells (T-IDO1) was frequently detected (109/112) by immunohistochemistry in formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded specimens from phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation patients, and the expression patterns were mostly focal (102/109).

entity.text: regulation of activated T cell proliferation

sentence.text: These findings indicated that T-regulation of activated T cell proliferation expression in phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation is common and is dominantly driven by the host antitumor immune response, which is a favorable prognostic factor in HCC

entity.text: regulation of activated T cell proliferation
